title: Person of Intetest - 3x20 - It's just irrelevant
author: George Finch
comment: Beautiful work of film in a TV show?!? How a show can create such a variety of emotions in 1 scene is astonishing, of course with the help of Daughter's amazing performance in 'Medicine'. Definitely one of the best shows i've seen, more shows need to take notes from this!
It's so scary to think that this is all over. Will always remember this show and the amazing people that took part in it. Always loved this scene. Thanks for uploading it!
The official channel doesn't have this part of the sequence, so props for putting it up!  Such a mesmerizing scene.
still gives me goosebumps. kudos to the entire PoI team
description: Person of Interest . Our heroes are on the run .
